subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: When Rick Nash and the Rangers take on the Islanders and their top line of John Tavares, Kyle Okposo and Thomas Vanek, a high-scoring affair could be the result.
snippet: When Rick Nash and the Rangers take on the Islanders and their top line of John Tavares, Kyle Okposo and Thomas Vanek, a high-scoring affair could be the result.
